name: The Cold Storage
base: You stand in a walk-in freezer. Rows of metal shelves hold frost-covered crates.

lens.believer: The frost grows in fractals that look uncomfortably like maps of the coastline. The cold isn't just physical; it's a presence.
lens.skeptic: Standard industrial freezer unit. The compressor is rattling slightly. Needs maintenance.
lens.haunted: It's cold. Just like it was that night. The shelves loom like ribs of a giant beast.

inserts.text: The compressor isn't just rattling. It's cycling in a prime number sequence. 2... 3... 5... 7...
A draft touches your neck, but the door is sealed tight.

passive_checks.success_text: Wooden crates in a freezer shouldn't generate their own heat.

ice.description: A patch of black ice on the floor.
